EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-03-17-5.8 Awareness Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic 5.8 is Live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-thank-you-turbonomic-5-7-5-8-release-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wbn-new-product-release&utm_content=03172017]]> {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, We’re excited to announce the release of Turbonomic 5.8. This version includes our latest and greatest HTML5 user experience, we encourage you to give it a try. We’ve also made significant enhancement to our support for Microsoft Hyper-V and System Center Virtual Machine Manager and certified Turbonomic for vSphere 6.5. Further documentation can be found in the Green Circle Community <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/community/products/pages/documentation]]>. The learn more about everything the 5.7 and 5.8 releases have in store watch our latest release webinar. <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-thank-you-turbonomic-5-7-5-8-release-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wbn-new-product-release&utm_content=03172017]]> - The Turbonomic Team
